branchCategory.name: Valves (All Types)
branchCategory.description: SMC's VQ7-6/7-8 series valve conforms to ISO standard 5591/I.  A choice of metal or rubber seal increases compatibility with various operating and environmental conditions.  Manifolds are available with a wide range of interface options to meet a variety of application requirements.  The VQ7-6/7-8 has a smaller, space-saving profile and is lighter in weight than the VS7/VP7 series.

branchItem.name: VQ7-6, ISO Standard Solenoid Valve, Size 1, Single Unit
branchItem.description: SMC's VQ7-6/7-8 series valve conforms to ISO standard 5591/I.  A choice of metal or rubber seal increases compatibility with various operating and environmental conditions.  Manifolds are available with a wide range of interface options to meet a variety of application requirements.  The VQ7-6/7-8 has a smaller, space-saving profile and is lighter in weight than the VS7/VP7 series.

branchItem.description: SMC's VQ7-6/7-8 series valve conforms to ISO standard 5591/I.  A choice of metal or rubber seal increases compatibility with various operating and environmental conditions.  Manifolds are available with a wide range of interface options to meet a variety of application requirements.  The VQ7-6/7-8 has a smaller, space-saving profile and is lighter in weight than the VS7/VP7 series.
